episodes.description: Japan's fascination with miniature representations has a history spanning hundreds of years. From theme parks, to foods, to landscapes, we examine all forms of this particularly Japanese artistry.
episodes.subtitle: The World of Miniatures
episodes.title: Explore Japan

episodes.description: The Manufacturing Spirit and Sustainability: Featuring artisans who are working to preserve time-honored crafts and clues into how a sustainable society can be achieved.
episodes.subtitle: The Manufacturing Spirit and Sustainability
episodes.title: Explore Japan

episodes.description: Japanese Gardens, Aesthetic Encounters: Gardener, Murasame Tatsumasa visits four authentic Japanese gardens in Kyoto and explores their unique beauties with experts.
episodes.subtitle: Japanese Gardens, Aesthetic Encounters
episodes.title: Explore Japan
